alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; New River Mesa; Northwest Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 15 at 9:54PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 1045 PM MST... At 953 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Castle Hot Springs, or 15 miles west of New River, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scottsdale, New River, Cave Creek, Carefree, Lake Pleasant, Desert Mountain, Anthem and Seven Springs. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 224 and 241. AZ Route 74 between mile markers 8 and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cave Creek, New River; New River Mesa; Northwest Valley
